overview: In Rotuno, within the protected area of the Rio de Janeiro Protocol, 40 men armed with blowguns and weapons begin their wedding rites, never before filmed, for the Sarayaku festivities. Yaku, who returns to his land after many years, goes on an epic journey where he must share hallucinogenic drinks, go hunting in total darkness, make his crown of feathers and participate in the dance of the spears...
title: El hombre del medio día
